replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 1a2s3d4f1 于 2020-8-20 11:51 编辑 

先说下，of对fabric的兼容特垃圾
去掉of咋会溢出内存？用openj9试试(zip包解压，选java路径，修复j9兼容mod，启动器的版本设置禁用默认参数，加以下参数
-Xms2500M -Xmx2500M -Xmns875M -Xmnx1625M -Xgc:concurrentScavenge -Xgc:dnssExpectedTimeRatioMaximum=3 -Xdisableexplicitgc复制代码

replies.author: 寒冰越愈
replies.txt_content:
1a2s3d4f1 发表于 2020-8-20 11:48
先说下，of对fabric的兼容特垃圾
去掉of咋会溢出内存？用openj9试试(zip包解压，选java路径，修复j9兼容mod ...
-Xss512K -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops -XX:+UseCMSCompactAtFullCollection -XX:+UseFastAccessorMethods -XX:ParallelGCThreads=4 -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:CMSFullGCsBeforeCompaction=2 -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=70 -XX:-DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90-Xss512K -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops -XX:+UseCMSCompactAtFullCollection -XX:+UseFastAccessorMethods -XX:ParallelGCThreads=4 -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:CMSFullGCsBeforeCompaction=2 -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=70 -XX:-DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90  
用的别人的参数,这个应该没问题吧awa
